docs.snippet: Mr. LINCOLN and his party left Pittsburgh in a smart shower, this morning, amid the enthusias tic plaudits of great numbers who lined the track for a long distance.

headline.main: ARRIVAL AND RECEPTION IN CLEVELAND.; ANOTHER SPEECH BY MR. LINCOLN. MR. LINCOLN'S SPEECH.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. LINCOLN and his party left Pittsburgh in a smart shower, this morning, amid the enthusias tic plaudits of great numbers who lined the track for a long distance.

docs.snippet: A telegram from St. Petersburgh says: "The negotiations be ween the banks of St. Petersburg and the Bank of France in reference to the exchange of gold for silver, have failed."
docs.lead_paragraph: A telegram from St. Petersburgh says: "The negotiations be ween the banks of St. Petersburg and the Bank of France in reference to the exchange of gold for silver, have failed."

docs.snippet: According to the report of the City Inspector, the mortality of this City in 1860 was 22,710, an increase over the preceding year of 1,065.

headline.main: THE PUBLIC HEALTH.; Review of the Report of the City Inspector.

docs.lead_paragraph: According to the report of the City Inspector, the mortality of this City in 1860 was 22,710, an increase over the preceding year of 1,065.

docs.snippet: The negotiations between the Bank of St. Petersburg and the Bank of France, in reference to the exchange of gold for silver, have failed.
